title: Dear Abby
itunes:title: Dear Abby
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
That feeling when you met them...when you locked eyes with someone you never realized even existed in the world...and it's so much worse than you could have imagined...

Content Warning: stalking

***

Credited to: Kyle "Kman" Mangione-Smith

***
